verses.text: O Lord, take me out \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* power \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* evil man; keep me safe from \w the|strong="H1732"\w* violent man:

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* hearts \w are|strong="H0376"\w* full \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* designs; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w ever|strong="H0120"\w* making ready causes \w of|strong="H0376"\w* war.

\w Their|strong="H3605"\w* tongues \w are|strong="H0834"\w* sharp \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tongue \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* snake; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* poison \w of|strong="H3117"\w* snakes \w is|strong="H0834"\w* under \w their|strong="H3605"\w* lips. (Selah.)

O Lord, take \w me|strong="H8478"\w* out \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* hands \w of|strong="H8478"\w* sinners; keep \w me|strong="H8478"\w* safe \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* violent man: \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w they|strong="H8478"\w* \w are|strong="H8193"\w* designing \w my|strong="H8478"\w* downfall.

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* pride \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H3027"\w* \w secret|strong="H5341"\w* cords \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w feet|strong="H6471"\w*; stretching nets \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* way, \w so|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w take|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H2803"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* tricks. (Selah.)

\w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* said \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* Lord, \w You|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*: give ear, O Lord, \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3027"\w* prayer.

\w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* strength \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* salvation, \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cover \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* head \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fight.

\w O|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, give not \w the|strong="H3069"\w* wrongdoer \w his|strong="H3117"\w* desire; give \w him|strong="H3117"\w* no \w help|strong="H3444"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3117"\w* evil designs, \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w may|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H0136"\w* uplifted \w in|strong="H3117"\w* pride. (Selah.)

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* come round \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* heads \w be|strong="H0408"\w* covered \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w evil|strong="H7563"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* lips.

Let burning flames come \w down|strong="H7218"\w* \w on|strong="H7218"\w* them: let them \w be|strong="H8193"\w* put into \w the|strong="H3680"\w* fire, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* into deep waters, so that they \w may|strong="H8193"\w* not get up again.

Let \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H0784"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* evil tongue \w be|strong="H4131"\w* safe \w on|strong="H5921"\w* earth: let destruction \w overtake|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* violent \w man|strong="H0784"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* blow \w on|strong="H5921"\w* blow.

\w I|strong="H0776"\w* am \w certain|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H0776"\w* take care \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* cause \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* poor, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* rights \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w those|strong="H0376"\w* \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* troubled.

\w Truly|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* upright \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* name: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* holy \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w place|strong="H4941"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* house.
